name: Against the Dying of the Light
name_original: Against the Dying of the Light
description:
A horrible incident leaves you, a simple father, desperately trying to save your child from hypothermia.

Against the Dying of the Light is a story-oriented survival adventure game. You start with nothing but a dying child and fire, and must use what little resources this forest has to offer to save your kiddo.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50. Vote for it!
Theme: Delay the Inevitable

Celtican: Programming and Audio
Gardenovena: Art and Animation
